_sText:
Destruction pack

Made by The Giblets of Jesus


In this pack, you'll find 10 prefabs, all contained within a single vmf. Each prefab is also Func Detail'ed as appropriate and uses a few brushes as possible for optimization processes.

As with all my prefabs, if you do decide to use one of these, or other of my other prefabs in your work, I'd like to credited as appropriate.

The prefabs

Side brick walls





Explosive propane tank


For more information on this prefab, please view the original prefab page:
Realistic propane prefab

Plaster + Concrete walls


For dynamic destruction sequence, gibs and further info on the concrete wall, please view the original prefab:
Destroyed wall + sequence

Brick / concrete walls



The pillars with selected red parts selected is a Fake DMM pillar, each red piece is a Func Physbox that flies off when shot.

Wooden hole in floor


Floor segment
